protocol.name: P-AFFY-2
protocol.text: Labeling of samples was carried out according to the manufacturer’s standard protocol

protocol.name: P-MEXP-9495
protocol.text: Total RNA was extracted according to the instructions of the RNeasy plant mini kit (Qiagen, Hilden, Germany)

protocol.name: P-MEXP-9497
protocol.text: Plants were grown in soil in a temperature controlled greenhouse at 22°C, with more than 12 hours of light. The youngest leaves larger than 2 mm. emerging from the rosette of greenhouse grown plants (4 weeks old) were used. The samples were collected in the middle of the day at the end of the winter in The Netherlands (March 15th). For the biological replicates, three to four mutant or two wild type leaves from different plants were pooled for one sample, and the same amount from different plants for the second sample.
